features: Bubbly Berry Splash Glade Air Freshener Spray has a fragrance crafted by master perfumers, with notes of raspberries, blackberries and a splash of champagne
Now with 2x more fragrance (vs Glade 7.6 oz spray), it’s easier than ever to enjoy waves of freshness – the can got a fashion makeover and the push button gives you improved comfort and control
Feel waves of fresh energy with this Glade air freshener – it uses 100% natural propellant, and is made without phthalates, parabens, formaldehyde, nitro musks or dyes
Surround yourself with a room air freshener fragrance infused with essential oils. Directions-Do not shake can. Hold can upright. Press button and spray in sweeping motion. Wipe floor if damp
Freshen any room in a spritz with this Glade aerosol spray – it makes it easy to add a refreshing spritz of personality to your home
body.description: It’s easier than ever to create a playful mood. Bubbly Berry Splash Glade Air Freshener Spray is now bursting with 2x more fragrance*, giving you extra power to revive the vibe. This air freshener for home use a fragrance crafted by master perfumers, with notes of raspberries, blackberries and a splash of champagne. And there’s more great news – the can also got a sleek makeover, while the push button has been changed to give you improved comfort and control. You still get the instantly refreshing burst of scent you love, but now it comes with 2x the fragrance*. Surround yourself with a room air freshener fragrance infused with essential oils. Feel waves of fresh energy and get a fragrance boost that uses 100% natural propellent. It’s made without phthalates, parabens, formaldehyde, nitro musks or dyes. With 2x the fragrance*, have fun with the air with Bubbly Berry Splash. * vs Glade 7.6 oz spray

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: A great value pack of air fresheners. This kind smells great and more fluid oz for your money worth. Great deal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This spray smells so good. Good to have in any room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars This new design is ABSOLUTELY WORTHLESS!
reviews.reviewText: This new "spritzer" is absolutely worthless! It may be "100% natural propellant, and is made without phthalates, parabens, formaldehyde, nitro musks or dyes," but it is absolutely horrible!First, it is weaker and inferior to Fabreze! It is NOT 2x as fragrant, if anything it is 1/2 as fragrant and only lasts a couple of minutes IF you spray onto some surface and leave it dry there (but then you have to clean up the residue).Second, it is more of a squirt or spray than a spritz. It leaves big drops on the floor if you attempt to spray it into the air, which is why I said to spray it onto some surface, that you can later wipe up.The original aerosol of this Bubbly Berry Splash was outstanding! This new "invention" is absolutely worthless!DO NOT BUY IT!DO NOT BUY THE OTHER NEW GLADE PRODUCTS, EITHER!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The smell is wonderful!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this scent!
reviews.reviewText: I'm very sensitive to smells and chemicals.. but I absolutely love this fragrance.. will buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It smell well but it does not last long, otherwise it’s okay

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I can be sensitive to some of these smells but I love this scent. I have one in every bathroom as to encourage my household to spray after they go. It’s a smell that is not offensive but light enough to be feminine. So far I have only been able to find this scent online.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Smells exactly like bug spray
reviews.reviewText: The berry splash smells exactly like bugs spray to me. Honestly, this is on me for buying a year's worth of an air freshener I hadn't smelled before. But it's uncanny. Straight up bug spray. 2 stars though because, if you like bug spray (and who am I to judge?), you'll love it.
